column1: U.S. average annual regular-grade gasoline prices, 1976-2023
Source: U.S. Energy Information Administration, Short-Term Energy Outlook, January 2022
Note: Prices are retail prices including taxes. Real prices are based on January 2022 dollar value. Prices for 2022 and 2023 are forecasts.

An interactive line chart comparing U.S. average annual regular-grade gasoline retail prices in real and nominal terms starting in 1976 with data through December 2021 and forecasts fro 2022 and 2023 with real prices are based on January 2022 dollar value. Prices for 2022 and 2023 are forecasts
